Step 1. In a blender, add 80 grams sweet corn and blend it into paste.

 Step 2. Heat 1/2 teaspoon oil in a pan, add blended sweet corn, 65 grams carrots, 45 grams cabbage and mix it well.

 Step 3. Cook for 5 - 7 minutes on medium heat.

 Step 4. Add 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper and mix it well.

 Step 5. Transfer this into a mixing bowl, add 190 grams boiled potatoes, 50 grams grated paneer and mix it well.

 Step 6. Take some mixture in your hands and shape it into a cutlet.

 Step 7. Heat some oil in a pan and shallow fry these until golden brown and crisp from all sides.

 Step 8. Remove it from heat.

 Step 9. Serve.
